overview: Nindya hates humans. For her everyone is trash. The only human she can tolerate is her girlfriend, Reno. And her younger sister, Tyas. One day Nindya found a site about a cult. In that sect, the only way to meet the devil is to have an orgasm, and one orgasm can grant a request. Nindya is determined to join the sect and sell her soul to the Devil. She has a request that she has been dreaming of, and she will do anything as long as her request is granted, despite the lives at stake.
title: Sentuhan Binal Iblis
